category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 18 (Application for hosting National Sports Competitions, etc.)
contents: Article 18 (Application for hosting National Sports Competitions, etc.) ① Member city/provincial sports associations that wish to host National Sports Competitions, etc. must prepare the following documents and submit a letter of guarantee from the head of the metropolitan government of the venue to host the National Sports Competitions, etc. 5 You must apply to the Sports Council one year in advance. Revised on January 24, 2022. 1. Facility status and spectator accommodation plan for each stadium 2. Stadium facility plan and opinion on stadium facility design from member sports organizations for stadiums requiring official approval 3. Procurement of required budget for direct use Method (including securing annual budget and execution plan) 4. Plans related to accommodation and transportation of athletes 5. Other matters related to hosting competitions ② The main venue where the opening and closing ceremony stadiums are located should be determined by population size, accommodation (including hotels), and The current status of infrastructure, etc. in the area must be recorded and submitted in detail. ③ The member city/provincial sports association applying for hosting must pay the hosting application fee to the sports association as an expense for activities such as general investigation, information collection, and evaluation of the host city/province in response to the application for hosting. Revised 2022. 1. 24. 2023. 3. 23. ④ The application fee is processed as the income of the sports association, and is not refunded regardless of whether the host is selected. The operation of the retention application fee follows separate guidelines. Newly established on March 23, 2023. ⑤ Member city/provincial sports associations wishing to host the National Sports Festival, etc. may apply for hosting only after 7 years have elapsed since the National Sports Festival was held. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
